titleStmt.title: The town-shifts, or, The suburb-justice a comedy, as it is acted at His Royal Highness the Duke of York's theatre.
titleStmt.author: Revet, Edward, fl. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring ... and William Cademan ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Edward Revet. cf. NUC pre-1956.
